title: Define System Requirements - RFC DRAFT Update
description: Update the functional and non-functional requirements for the PersonalizedSummaryTailor system. The updated requirements should include user roles (Editor, Researcher, Manager, etc.), input formats (DOCX, PDF, TXT), output formats (HTML, plain text), performance expectations (summarize a 1000-word document in under 5 seconds), security/privacy considerations (data encryption, anonymization, user consent management), potential integrations with existing systems (Google Docs, Microsoft Word), edge cases (multiple roles for a user, inconsistent data formats), and error handling mechanisms. Considering the complexity of the project, it would be beneficial to break down the tasks into smaller, manageable pieces.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the high-level architecture of the system, including components for user management, document processing, summarization, personalization, and user interface.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration/deployment pipelines, and development tools.

title: Implement User Management
description: Implement the user management component, including user registration, authentication, and role management.

title: Implement Document Processing
description: Implement the document processing component, including document ingestion, parsing, and storage.
